tasks.task: Contributing to Food Safety and Production in Popcorn Factory
subtasks: Observing and understanding food safety standards in the factory
Noticing the evolution from dust prevention to liquid sterilization processes
Assisting in the inspection of the production line during the liquid sterilization phase
Monitoring the transportation of products via conveyor belts for quality control
Participating in mixing syrup and processing it through the baking and cooling stages
Supervising the machine-operated filling and sealing of popcorn packages
Ensuring the selection and quality of corn harvested from northeastern China for popcorn production
Promoting the health benefits and traditional flavors of the final product
